title: Mobile-Based Online Language Instruction Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of fundamental instructional design theory and experience with online education tools
context.additional_context: Enhancing the capability to design language education content in a microlearning environment accessible via smartphones.

learning_goals: Identify 80%+ of core elements (feedback systems, multimedia materials, etc.) for mobile-optimized online language instruction
Propose at least three interaction design solutions implementable in limited technological environments (smartphone-only)
Develop prototypes of practical language learning modules through project-based assessment

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
